name: Shop 'N' Go Toy Shopping Cart for Kids and Toddler - Includes Food - Folds for Easy Storage - with Sturdy Metal Frame Pretend Play Food Role Play, Educational Toy (Doll Not Included)
short_description: KIDS-FRIENDLY MINI SHOPPING CART: Sturdy and playful, our 25 inches children's shopping cart is designed for endless playtime fun. With its durable foldable steel frame and rubber rolling wheels, this portable and easy-to-store push buggy is the perfect size for kids aged 3-8. An ideal doll accessory, it encourages imaginative play and helps kids learn essential life skills.

VERSATILE SHOPPING EXPERIENCE: Unlike other toddler shopping carts, our 25-inch baby shopping cart features a removable basket with folding handles. The pink basket can be inserted for a rolling pushcart experience, or easily taken off for handheld use as a grocery basket. This dual functionality adds excitement to your child's pretend shopping adventures.

DOLL-FRIENDLY DESIGN: Tailored for toddlers who love playing with baby dolls, our realistic toy shopping cart comes with a charming floral fabric seat. This seat allows the little ones to comfortably seat their 18 inches doll babies while navigating the supermarket. Watch as tiny tots enjoy the thrill of pushing the cart with their favorite doll companions in tow.

COMPLETE SHOPPING EXPERIENCE: Elevate the playtime fun with our mini shopping cart that includes a pack of pretend groceries. With 24 plastic food toys, kids can engage in sorting, counting, packing, and organizing, mimicking a realistic supermarket experience. Our mini shopping carts are the go-to choice for toddlers who love to play grocery shopping

PERFECT GIFT FOR AGES 3-8: An excellent choice for 3 to 8-year-olds, our Red toy shopping basket makes for a delightful gift. Inspire imaginative play, creativity, and practical life activities like making shopping lists, exploring aisles, and organizing groceries. This shopping cart is sure to be a hit with young ones exploring the world of make-believe shopping.
product_description: Take your shopping list and your teddy bear and get ready to shop with this great shopping cart. This product comes with all the necessary parts to give your child a realistic grocery shopping experience. The basket will fit all 36 pieces of play-food and still have plenty of room for any other toddler-necessities (stuffed-animals, dolls, toys etc.!) When assembled, the shopping cart will be 25" tall at the handle, 16.5" long (handle to end of basket) and 12" wide at the wheel-base. Modern and realistic pretend-shopping cart is designed to give those aspiring grocery shoppers a real taste of a trip to the super market...just without the bill! Includes: shopping cart in red, 36 pieces of pretend food (plastic), and assembly instructions. Intended for ages 3 and up. Easy to maneuver, fun to fill, and built to last for years of pretend play.

name: Melissa & Doug Wooden Shape Sorting Grocery Cart Push Toy and Puzzles - Pretend Play Grocery Toys, Sorting and Stacking Toys for Infants and Toddlers Ages 1+ - FSC-Certified Materials
short_description: Explore shapes, colors, problem-solving, imaginative play, and more with this sturdy wooden grocery cart push toy with wooden shape-sorting and chunky puzzle pieces
16-piece set includes wooden cart with built-in matching game roller drum and cup holder, 2 wooden chunky puzzle boards, 12 wooden chunky shape-sorting/puzzle pieces, play coffee cup with lid

Sort pieces through cart sides or fit into 2 puzzle boards that store in the cart; helps encourage fine and gross motor skills, problem-solving, color and shape recognition, sorting and sequencing, counting, and more
Melissa & Doug infant and toddler toys inspire “a-ha” moments of discovery. Adorable, diverse characters and a variety of fun shapes and textures encourage exploratory, skill-building play
Makes a great gift for infants and toddlers, ages 12 months to 2 years, for hands-on, screen-free play and developmental skill-building
product_description: This cheery and sturdy wooden grocery cart is filled with fun skill-building activities! Very young kids can sort colorful chunky wooden food shapes through holes in the sides of the cart, and place them in two wooden puzzle boards that store in the cart. Spin the built-in roller drum for sensory stimulation and matching games, and enhance imitative pretend play with a realistic coffee cup with removable lid that fits in a cup holder in the cart! As kids grow, using the cart as a push toy helps build motor skills and inspire imaginative play. A great way to encourage kids 12 months and older to explore problem-solving and cause-and-effect. Assembled cart measures 15.5 inches tall, 10.75 inches wide, 15 inches long (39.4 cm x 27.3 cm x 38 cm). Melissa & Doug infant and toddler toys inspire “a-ha!” moments of discovery. Adorable, diverse characters and a variety of fun shapes and textures encourage exploratory, skill-building play. FSC certification ensures that products come from responsibly managed forests that provide environmental, social, and economic benefits, and that forests are protected for future generations. Please note that FSC certification applies to new inventory only (FSC C156584).

Its mobility and multiple uses make it an indispensable part of any playroom!

name: HEY! PLAY! Kids Shopping Cart - Toddler Grocery Cart with Pivoting Front Wheels and Folds for Easy Storage - for Pretend Play Grocery Store
short_description: REALISTIC SHOPPING CART FOR KIDS - Whether your child loves grocery store pretend play or shopping for toys in a make-believe department store, this play shopping cart with working wheels is a perfect accessory to nurture creativity and spark imagination.

SPACIOUS CART - This grocery cart for kids has ample room where your little shopper can store groceries or small toys, and it features a red basket seat to let your child's favorite doll or stuffed animal become part of an exciting shopping adventure.

EASY STORAGE - Fold up this toy grocery cart and store it in a closet or a corner of the play area when not in use, or easily transport it in your car when going to the supermarket so your child can do pretend shopping in an actual grocery store with you.

SAFE AND FUN TO USE - The thoughtfully designed kids' grocery cart handle features a protective plastic cover that allows a comfortable grip for little hands, while the pivoting front wheels help make the toy shopping cart easy for toddlers to maneuver.
PRODUCT DETAILS - Materials: Plastic Handle with Metal Frame. Dimensions: (L) 16" x (W) 11.5" x (H) 23.5". Recommended for Children Ages 3 and Older. Color: Red.
